C01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: The enigmatic individual you encountered passed through this door.

C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You find yourself in a place filled with countless floating doors. Will one of them lead you back to Capitol City?

C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.text: Upon riding the elevator, you found yourself in the space with many doors once more.

C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_100_DETAIL.text: You should report your encounter with the mysterious organization Quisstatium to section chief Hernandez.

C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.text: You've finally gathered all of the triangles. It's time to find a door to take you back to Capitol City.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_000_TITLE.text: The Door Beyond the Green Line

C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: Will this door lead you back to Capitol City?

C01_DOOR_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_TITLE.text: The Door Behind Which Something Waits

C01_DOOR_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.text: Is there another jungle on the other side of this door? Or does it lead elsewhere?

C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_RETURN_800_DETAIL.text: Capitol City awaits you on the other side of this door. It's time to take all the triangles home.

C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_TITLE.text: The Power to Open the Way

C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_BOFO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: The path you must follow has been illuminated for you. Is this the triangle's power?

C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_SCAN_BOFO_1STMISSION_000_DETAIL.text: Will following this line lead you to the truth about the triangles and the president's betrayal?

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W01_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W01_000_DETAIL.text: Though all these doors look the same, the enigma of an ancient city awaits on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W02_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W02_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, a magical enigma awaits on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W03_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W03_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, a dark enigma awaits on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W04_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W04_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, an ocean-bound enigma awaits on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W06_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W06_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, an enigma within a mysterious world awaits on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W07_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W07_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, temples will solve the enigma on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W08_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W08_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, solving the enigma on the other side of this one will require some digging.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W10_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W10_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, there is an enigma to be pursued on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W11_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W11_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, an enigma will blossom on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W12_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W12_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, the world on the other side of this one is cold enough to freeze even an enigma.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W13_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W13_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, an enigma is buried under the sand on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W14_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W14_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, a place to observe enigmas is on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W15_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W15_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, a great enigma is at the core of everything that's happened on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W17_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W17_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, the answer to an enigma can be earned through battle on the other side of this one.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_BATTLE_VH_000_DETAIL.text: A truly grueling battle awaits beyond this door.

C01_DOOR_BOFO_W18_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_BOFO_W18_000_DETAIL.text: Though all the doors look the same, all the answers you desire are on the other side of this one.
